column5: Just a reminder and FYI...the fiddleheads are up.
Have never tried them, but a post on here last year really peaked my interest.  unfortunately I don't think there are any around here.
they are everywhere find shade, damp beds by creeks and rivers.
Is that the only "greens" y'all hosers eat???... I'd love to try them!  ... do they taste like Collard Greens???
hmmm ... have some time to kill after I drop my son off at school in the morning
The day I eat fiddleheads is the day I have some fresh-caught trout to fry up with 'em!  I sure hope that day is coming soon
